name: @appcom/writeme
description: This is an interactive generator for creating readme files according to the appcom readme styleguide

scripts.publish: git flow release start $npm_package_version && git flow release finish -m "$npm_package_version" $npm_package_version && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.postpatch: git add package.json && git commit -m "Bump version patch number" package*

author: Stefan Neidig <s.neidig@appcom-interactive.de>
